radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe right-sided cerebral edema with a midline shift and mild left-sided edema.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A second CT scan showed severe, worsened right-sided cerebral edema.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive deep and subcortical white-matter changes in the right hemisphere and posterior left hemisphere.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Weekly neuroimaging revealed slowly decreasing white-matter edema in both hemispheres and evolving encephalomalacia and atrophy over the course of the following 6 weeks.
